statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, current_price FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, base_price FROM products WHERE base_price > 50;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE demand_level >= 3 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, current_price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, current_price FROM products WHERE base_price > 50
SELECT * FROM products WHERE demand_level = 3 ORDER BY current_price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, base_price, current_price FROM products WHERE demand_level = 1 AND current_price < 100
SELECT product_name, base_price, current_price FROM products WHERE demand_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY product_name ASC, current_price DESC
SELECT product_name, base_price, current_price FROM products ORDER BY base_price DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT id, name, price, demand_level FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE demand_level > 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%' AND price < 50;
SELECT id, strategy_name, price_adjustment FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY effective_date;
SELECT id, strategy_name, price_adjustment FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price_adjustment >= 0.1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE demand_level = 1 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.id, p.name, ps.strategy_name FROM products p JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON p.id = ps.id WHERE ps.effective_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.id;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM products;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, ps.strategy_name AS pricing_strategy FROM products p LEFT JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON p.id = ps.id WHERE ps.price_adjustment >= 0.5 ORDER BY product_name ASC, pricing_strategy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, current_price FROM Product WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Demand WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, base_price, current_price FROM Product WHERE base_price > 100 ORDER BY current_price ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM PricingStrategy WHERE min_price < max_price;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, base_price FROM Product WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, current_price FROM Product ORDER BY current_price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, d.timestamp, d.location FROM Product p JOIN Demand d ON p.product_id = d.product_id WHERE d.demand_level > 50;
SELECT ps.strategy_name, ps.description, p.product_name, p.base_price FROM PricingStrategy ps JOIN Product p ON ps.min_price <= p.base_price AND ps.max_price >= p.base_price;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, base_price FROM Product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, base_price FROM Product ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, base_price FROM Product WHERE base_price > 50.00;
SELECT p.product_name, pr.discount_rate FROM Product p JOIN Promotion pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Product ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, base_price FROM Product WHERE base_price > 100;
SELECT p.product_name, pr.discount_rate FROM Product p JOIN Promotion pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT ps.strategy_name, ps.start_date FROM PricingStrategy ps WHERE ps.adjust_rate < 0.05;
SELECT pd.demand_level, p.base_price, pr.discount_rate FROM MarketDemand pd LEFT JOIN Product p ON pd.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN Promotion pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM products WHERE demand_level = 3
SELECT id, name, price, demand_level FROM products ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE demand_level >= 3 ORDER BY price DESC, id ASC
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE demand_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, name, price, demand_level FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND demand_level > 2 ORDER BY demand_level DESC, id ASC
